/* eslint-disable jsx-a11y/anchor-is-valid */ import { Component } from "react"; import 'materialize-css/dist/css/materialize.min.css' import { Consumo } from "../models/consumo"; type props = { titulo: string, tema: string, consumos: Consumo[] } export default class ListaConsumo extends Component { render() { let estiloTitulo = `center-align blue-text` let titulo = `${this.props.titulo}` return ( <>
{titulo}
{this.props.consumos.map((consumo, i) => ( ))}
ID da Compra Data Valor total (R$) Ação
{consumo.getId()} {consumo.getData()} R${consumo.getTotal()} edit delete
this.geraBotaoNovo() ) } geraBotaoNovo() { let estiloBotaoNovo = `btn waves-effect waves-light ${this.props.tema}` return ( <> ) } }
